title: Adjust game card pricing display to medium size

requirements.text: Modify the price display in GameCard component to use medium sizing - not too small, not too large - while keeping it positioned in the top right corner below the sale label

quotes: Not too small keep it medium not too large not too small

acceptanceCriteria: Price text is visually balanced - larger than small text but not oversized
Price remains in top right corner position
Price stays below the sale label when both are present

constraints: Keep the existing color scheme unchanged
Maintain WhatsApp symbol at the top
Keep sale label in top left corner
Do not modify backend game data structures
nonGoals: Changing the color scheme or visual theme
Modifying the horizontal scrolling arrow implementation
Adjusting WhatsApp symbol styling or position
Changing sale label styling or position
